comments.text:
This bug happens when you click or double click on the message in the message list to open it, so it appears to be different -- although it may be related -- from Bug 619493 that happens simply receiving an e-mail with many addresses (with this bug Thunderbird work fine until you don't try to open the message), and from Bug 460605 that happens when you right click on an e-mail with too many addresses (with this bug you can right click and delete the offending e-mail).
It doesn't seem to be specifically related to other bugs in that list, like Bug 548413 which is about messages with very long lines (this bug happens also when there's a single e-mail address per line), or Bug 564051 which is about very large attachments.
